repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:22.04

ENV CARDANO_NODE_URL=https://hydra.iohk.io/build/13065769/download/1/cardano-node-1.34.1-linux.tar.gz
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
ENV TZ=UTC

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install \
    postgresql-client \
    jq \
    wget \
    s3cmd \
    cron && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN wget -O cardano-node.tar.gz \
    ${CARDANO_NODE_URL}
RUN tar -xvzf cardano-node.tar.gz ./cardano-cli && mv ./cardano-cli /bin/ && rm cardano-node.tar.gz

COPY s3cfg /root/.s3cfg
COPY entrypoint.sh /
COPY backup.sh /

RUN crontab -l | { cat; echo "0 */12 * * * /backup.sh >> /var/log/cron.log 2>&1"; } | crontab -

ENTRYPOINT /entrypoint.sh
